title: Efficient Product Inventory Maintenance for Black Friday Sale via Spark Big Data System
abstract: The hardware in the UMBC High Performance Computing Facility (HPCF) is supported by the U.S. National Science Foundation through the MRI program (grant nos. CNS–0821258, CNS–1228778, and OAC–1726023) and the SCREMS program (grant no. DMS–0821311), with additional substantial support from the University of Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC). We would like to extend special thanks to our instructor Dr. Jianwu Wang for supporting us.
